Red Right Hand is a 2024 American action thriller film directed by Ian Nelms and Eshom Nelms and starring Orlando Bloom and Andie MacDowell.[2]
Red Right Hand was released on February 23, 2024.


Plot[edit]
This article needs a plot summary. Please add one in your own words. (February 2024) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)
Cash is trying to live an honest and quiet life taking care of his recently orphaned niece Savannah in the Appalachian town of Odim County. When the sadistic kingpin Big Cat who runs the town forces him back into her services, Cash learns he is capable of anything—even killing—to protect the town and the only family he has left.
As the journey gets harder, Cash is drawn into a nightmare that blurs the lines between good and evil.

Kenneth Miller as The Buck[7]
Nicholas Logan as The Doe[7]
Production[edit]
Principal photography occurred in April 2022 in Campbellsburg, Shepherdsville, and New Castle, Kentucky.[8][9][10][11]
In May 2022, Redbox Entertainment was announced to be the film's distributor in the United States.[12]
In January 2023, the film went to post-production.[13]

Release[edit]
The film was released in theaters and on VOD on February 23, 2024.[14]

Reception[edit]
On the review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, 44% of 18 critics' reviews are positive, with an average rating of 5.2/10.[15]
